StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetO.cerProgramHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT H.OFFICER_PROGRAM_HISTORY_ID, C.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION AS OFFICER_PROGRAM, CONVERT(CHAR(11), H.OFFICER_PROGRAM_CHANGED_DATE, 106) AS OFFICER_PROGRAM_CHANGED_DATE, H.OFFICER_PROGRAM_CHANGED_DATE FROM OFFICER_PROGRAM_HISTORY H INNER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE C ON H.OFFICER_PROGRAM = C.COMPONENT_CODE WHERE H.NWA_ID = @NWAID ORDER BY H.OFFICER_PROGRAM_CHANGED_DATE DESC, H.OFFICER_PROGRAM_HISTORY_ID DESC
